name: NoiseofOcean
0:
”Alexa open noise of ocean”
”Alexa ask noise of ocean to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noise of ocean
des: Fall asleep to the calming noise of ocean. Unwind after a long day, find solace during meditation, or create a soothing atmosphere for work or study. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Noise of Ocean, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
